      SENIOR        : 26%   GRADUATE     : 7%

      VERY FAST     : 8%    RATHER FAST  : 47%   MODERATE     : 43%
      RATHER SLOW   : 1%    VERY SLOW    : 0

      VERY HEAVY    : 10%   RATHER HEAVY : 19%   MODERATE     : 58%
      RATHER LIGHT  : 11%   VERY LIGHT   : 1%
